AstroBinExport.name: AstroBin Export
AstroBinExport.description: Generates CSV files compatible with AstroBin's bulk acquisition upload feature. Includes automatic FITS header analysis, comprehensive filter database (200+ filters), personal filter sets, and more.
features: Automatic FITS header analysis
200+ filters across 22+ manufacturers
Personal LRGB + SHO filter set support
Selectable/persistent CSV columns
Improved SQM derivation
Raw frame filtering
Manual filter ID entry
Bortle scale integration

Signature.name: Master Signature
Signature.description: Adds professional signature blocks and logos to processed astrophotography images with automatic FITS integration.
features: Two-line signature format
Automatic FITS integration
Logo overlay support
Live preview with zoom
Professional typography

SNRAnalysis.name: SNR Analysis
SNRAnalysis.description: Analyzes how SNR improves with integration depth by creating partial integrations from calibrated and registered subframes and measuring SNR in user-defined ROIs. Generates dual graphs (SNR & Gain/hr), CSV/JSON output, and provides actionable insights about diminishing returns.
features: MorphologicalTransformation-based range masking for accurate foreground/background separation
Expanded integration methods: OSC preset, doubling, Fibonacci, logarithmic, by-hour, custom
Dual graph system: SNR vs Time and Gain/hr vs Time with dropdown selector
Gain per hour metric showing marginal improvement rate
Organized output structure: SNRAnalysis/{data/, graphs/, integrations/, previews/}
Enhanced UI with better section organization and tooltips
Full-depth reference integration with multi-mode ROI selection (Range Mask, Auto, Manual)
Per-depth partial integrations with multiple normalization options
Optional starless stack generation (StarNet2/StarXTerminator)
Optional STF-based stretching for visual comparison
ROI-based SNR measurement with automatic tile-based analysis
Stack preview with auto-stretch in results dialog
CSV and JSON output with full metadata and timing logs
Automated insights (diminishing returns, scaling exponent, T+10 hours analysis)
Reference master window visibility for verification
